de.exobros.exogdx.sbg

Class MenuState

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.exobros.exogdx.sbg.GameState
      • de.exobros.exogdx.sbg.MenuState

  • public abstract class MenuState
extends GameState
    Author:
    Exobros A StateBasedGame GameState which is an automatic Menu Set the MenuSetup, and the entries, to have a full functioning Menu

      abstract MenuSetup getMenuSetup()
      Loads the MenuSetup
      void init()
      loads the MenuSetup (abstract Method getMenuSetup) loads the Entries (abstract Method loadEntries) initializes camera and SpriteBatch initializes the gui updates the gui ( updateButtons() )
      abstract void loadEntries()
      Loads the Entries
      void onEnter()
      Sets the libGdx Input processor to the gui
      void onLeave()
      Resets the libGdx Input processor
      void render()
      draws the background and the gui
      void update(float delta)
      Is Called by the corresponding StateBasedGame's UpdateThread after a minimum of time has passed (default 10ms)
      void updateButtons()
      updates The GUI to match the current entries.
